---
title: "Registration"
---

Registration closes on January 23. We do not offer on-site registration.

#### Regular Pricing

Early registration features a 20% discount and is available until December 1, or until we sell out.

Early registration (up to December 1): $160

Late registration (after December 1): $200

#### Student Pricing (with valid student ID)

Student pricing is intended for any full-time student (not just Rice students). Student-priced registrations are limited, so we encourage students not to delay registration.

Early registration (up to December 1): $80

Late registration (after December 1): $100
